website_summaries.verdict: Offers space and easy setup, but the trade-offs include some quality issues and difficulties taking it down and putting it in its bag.
pros: Extremely versatile and user-friendly thanks to a design that is easy to set up, spacious enough for up to 4 people, and lightweight to carry
cons: Like others in its class, the challenge is returning it to the carrying bag
May not protect interior from water in extremely wet conditions
Some reports of threads and seams coming loose

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Just as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Received it yesterday, it was much larger (packed up) then expected. See pic, i'm 5'3". It literally pops right into shape. Each opening has two layers, opaque and netting. And each layer has two sided zipper hold, one for when you are inside (inside facing zip) and one when you are outside (outside facing zip). Hubby loved the "ceiling" opening so he could enjoy the warm sun and stare at the sky, while being shielded from the cold california beach winds. It fits two adults and my toddler child just fine, and should sleep up if camping just fine too.
customer_reviews.author: Sal in Cali

customer_reviews.title: Beat beach buy.
customer_reviews.text: Best beach accessory ever. Sets up easy. I got the 4-person tent for my wife and I. Even on a windy day all I did was open the panels and removed the top flap and the breeze flowed right through. Great for a mid-day beach nap. Kept all our personal stuff inside and zipped up while in the surf. The take down was easy even while fighting said wind. It’s like a huge sunshade that folds in on itself. I managed to pack it up in under 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to open and fold, good for 4 persons to seat inside
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tent and would recomend it whether for camping or park/beach as a shelter for privacy and security The advantages of this tent are 1. Having window in all 4sides plus the roof 2. Easy to open and fold
customer_reviews.author: MySweetAdrian

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!!!
customer_reviews.text: My toddlers love playing tent and this is the perfect size for them. A queen size mattress fit nicely into the tent. There are windows on both sides for ventilation. Love the two entrances option. And it literally took about 1 second to set up the tent 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Tina T.

customer_reviews.title: Lovin’ this extra camping bedroom....
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome ‘tent’...I forfeited the trailer bed to my granddaughter on my last camping trip so I needed to find something that I didn’t have to get on the ground for. This was perfect.... held me...my lounge chair and one dog and a side table perfectly. Slept like a baby! And got to look at the stars too. Would not use it where the weather is questionable.... (I’m in So Cal). Open up and ‘waa laa’. Folding up takes some practice... think the circular auto shades that you fold up to a 12” diameter....same principle...
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent • Perfect • Tent
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for various situations such as shelter from the shade, tent for the kids to ply in, place to nap for an adult. It’s bigger than it looks. You literally open the bag and in springs into a tent. Closing it is a pain, but once you do it a few timesaver it’s ok. There are instructions on how close it - follow them - don’t try & be slick to outsmart it. It is wide enough for Queen sized air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and easy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to entertain my child during the China-virus lockdown. The tent has been dragged repeatedly by me over grass and gravel while my 85-pound child is inside and we have repeatedly rolled it down a grassy incline while we are inside it. I fully expected it to rip in the course of these antics but it has survived unscathed. Very impressed by this tent. The folding is easy if you watch the video showing that the final step in collapsing it is to laterally slide one circle under the other circle, meaning slide it sideways, which the illustrated instructions do not clarify.
customer_reviews.author: dcdad

customer_reviews.title: Huge tent and impossible to fold up
customer_reviews.text: This thing pops right open perfectly. It is huge! Worked well on the beach with our newborn as I was able to nurse her in privacy, then open the sides to let a breeze blow through for her. But closing it!! Impossible! We practiced a million times before the beach, someone wrestled it to the ground and got it. After the beach took another million tries in the sand. Reluctant to ever open it again! Watched the YouTube- did not help! It should make 2 figure-8’s, we got one big figure 8 which couldn’t put the tie around or fit in the bag. Just be warned it’s a headache
customer_reviews.author: shannon__alexis

customer_reviews.title: Summer only. Not for rain, drizzle, dew, or cool weather.
customer_reviews.text: The listing specified water resistance and could be used in the rain but it really cannot. They were so close with this one, but moisure goes right through the zippers on the side windows, you can see straight through the zippers, even dew would come in. They could have put a little flap over the zippers, or even better they could have extended the rain fly to cover the side windows if needed, or both. Anyway, this is 100% summer weather tent only. It pops open easily but is really difficult to fold at first, takes a good 20 minutes of watching tutorials and getting the hang of it. After you get the muscle memory it is mostly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott P Savage

customer_reviews.title: My hurricane shelter
customer_reviews.text: I work in healthcare and am required to be at the hospital either during or after a hurricane. During previous storms, trying to sleep in a large room with many other people was difficult for me, plus people entering or leaving the room made noise and changed the lighting so I was constantly being awakened. Got this for this past hurricane season and it was awesome. I did not take up any more space than I would have before yet I had some privacy. With this tent, an air mattress and portable fan I was very comfortable. Everyone that saw it loved the idea. I expect to see many more people with tents if there’s another storm this year.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hot beach day must-have!
customer_reviews.text: Fits 3 -4 kids under the age of 10 perhaps. Good for 2 average sized adults. Lots of ventilation. Easy to assemble. Practically pops out of the zip bag it comes in. NOT easy to put back into the bag. It does come with a link for a video to watch on how to fold it back up and a paper instructional. Great for the beach, not thick enough for camping under rain.
customer_reviews.author: Einsteinium

customer_reviews.title: Got what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered on time and was exactly what I expected. Super easy to set up. However, the instructions did not adequately describe the final step on how to fold it back up. The video was helpful but the person in the video has obviously folded it back up many, many times to make it look that simple. After several tries I sort of figured it out on my own. I think it will take several more successes at folding it back up in the back yard before I get comfortable enough with it to take it to the beach though.
customer_reviews.author: PNeff17761

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you want to keep it set up all of the time.
customer_reviews.text: Used it as an extra tent for camping. It popped up no problem...but trying to fold it back to it's original case caused my carpel tunnel to resurface, the frame nearly poked someone's eye by 1/2" and we had to leave our Campsite by a certain time. We couldn't get it packed correctly, so we put the black frame cables under SUV's spare tire compartment (folded them into a circle shape). Unfortunately, one of the ends to the cable must have stretched out and busted a wire that connected to the Cars Audio System. Now we have to get that fixed. The directions were horrible when it came to folding. My hands are still numb from doing this.
customer_reviews.author: Reality Gal

customer_reviews.title: Keumer Pop-Up Tent/Beach Cabana
customer_reviews.text: Nice little beach cabana. Actually, it will fit three+ people. Minimal assembly for wind - an overhead piece with nylon straps and metal stakes are included. Otherwise, open the shoulder bag (very light), take out the tent (very thin), unstrap it while holding it tightly and throw it a few feet. You really need to throw it to avoid possible injury. The spars are quite thick compared to some other 'tents'. It automatically unfolds rapidly in 1 to 2 seconds. Very quick to refold with a little practice and uh, moderate strength. A bargain buy for occasional outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie B.

customer_reviews.title: Convenience makes these worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the tent! We are travel junkies with 3 kids. We bought two. Threw them out at our destination, and had our campsite ready even if we rolled in late. Pick up was just as fast. We were back on the road in no time thanks to these bad boys!
customer_reviews.author: Cassi

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and provides great cross ventilation
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I used this tent for the first time at a South Florida beach and it was perfect for the blazing hot weather. Took seconds to set-up and under a minute to take down.The two zippered doors and mesh windows provided great air circulation - definitely best feature. It's very roomy and can fit at least 3 people comfortably with a medium size cooler, beach bag and accessories. Four stars because of one downside - the mesh skylight. While it's a nice feature for outdoor, night time star gazing, the rain will come inside the tent, even with the fabric covering.
customer_reviews.author: Bahati Banks

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my now-7 years old Granddaughters birthday. I had my doubts because the price was so low. However I am very happy with this tent! It was much larger than I had pictured. There are two large doors with screens and two screened windows. The roof has a screen and rain cover. Very well ventilated and very roomy. There is a learning curve to refold but once you get the hang of it it is so quick! Great tutorials on YouTube for refold. She can set it up outside for a play fort and have a few friends join. Love this tent!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: So far.. its usable
customer_reviews.text: Used 2 times. It is really easy to unfold. Just throw it out and WHAM! However, folding back up can be an issue. It took a while to figure out how to fold even after watching the videos. I used it at the beach and it is good except sand gets everywhere inside.. dont use a blanket inside the tent.. And it is BIG.. folded it is big... and heavy.. so not for people that dont like heavy
customer_reviews.author: Jaehee L.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little tent.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little tent. I believe it says 3 man but it really only fits 2 unless you want to be tight together. It is so convenient for camping quickly. I cross country traveled with it so it was up and down everyday. Unlike other reviews I had no problem with it in high wind, the desert wind was no match for this little tent. I didn't like that the roof screen cover just hooks outside. Without the cover it's like a sunroof. I recommend this tent, it kept me out of funky motel rooms. Yoga mats fit inside with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Shob

customer_reviews.title: Easiest tent ever to use
customer_reviews.text: This tent is perfect for quick camping. All you do is remove the strap and toss it up and away. It opens and, BAM, you got yourself a tent. Big enough to fit 2 people and backpacks for sure. It is also fairly light. Not quick, backpacking weight, but it is light enough to carry around if need be. It is a large disk size, maybe Captain America shield size, so not something easy to carry. Maybe if they gave two straps instead of one and you can carry it like a backpack, it may be easier. But for car camping, this is a definite perfect little tent. If you have 4 people buy 2!
customer_reviews.author: DrScrubs

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and light Tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent is basically a throw in the air and "voila" the tent is ready to use. It's very spacious and I'm 5'8". It did take a little practice to fold back together so I do suggest you practice at home before you go out in public. The material is very light and blocks the wind. Comes with two sides that zip and used as doors and two smaller ones that are used as vents. Thinking of buying another one for a family member.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: It is great...until it is time to store.
customer_reviews.text: First time out to the beach with pop up, opened easily, fit myself and 2 kids quite cozy, big enough to sit and eat lunch, or nap. When it came time to fold up, it got complicated. I tried to follow instructions but first folded into a giant circle, then struggled maybe 6 minutes until it just seemed to do its thing. The strap was folded inside, but I stuffed the whole thing best as i good back into carrier. I opened up again at home to practice, it took 2 adults 15 minutes to work it back into the bag. Maybe I will watch an instructional video?
customer_reviews.author: Irma

customer_reviews.title: Better than a beach umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to use this!... popped it open to practice closing it as some other reviewers have suggested. Took about 3or 4 tries. Bought it primarily for our bulldog and German shepherd...but the 2 of us can fit in with them , comfortably...its deceptively bigger than I thought!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia M. Parrilla

customer_reviews.title: This is a straight up awesome tent!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a tent I could take to the beach or park so I needed it to be compact, easy to set up (pops up), spacious (to fit us and the baby), extremely breathable (since we live in a subtropical climate), and that keeps the ferocious mosquitos out. This tent is all that and then some. And the quality is great! It's seriously one of the best purchases I've made on Amazon. I do highly recommend watching a video on folding it up and practicing it BEFORE taking it out. At first it might be confusing but once you get it, it's a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Phenyx

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to fold back
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment so i bought this thinking i could fold it back and store it in my closet but the only way it folds back is HUGE. i mean, i thought it was my error so i had my boyfriend try to fold it back so it can fit in the case and he wasn't able to as well ( and he is a very smart handy guy). So now i have this 5 ft circle taking up room in my tiny apartment. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: ASMRgirlfriend

customer_reviews.title: First/Last/Only Tent for me!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this thing! I dont waste any time pitching tents. I literally throw it out of its bag and poof! like magic. Take your time and learn how it folds up. very tricky the first couple of times. instructions are great. video would help. its actually really easy once you learn it. Ill buy another one if i break this one somehow. Great price/quality. couple of extra pockets and bug screens! Cant use it to hike with and will take up trunk space if you dont have a truck.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dreiling

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Great quality and use.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time at the beach yesterday--it was fantastic! It was very windy, and this product held up very well. It is really large (others have said it fits a queen sized air mattress, which sounds about right), literally popped open right away with no fuss. The only thing was we had some trouble folding it back up even after watching the video from Amazon. My friend was able to, but I still need some practice lol. She liked it so much, she actually ordered one for herself today. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Words can't express how much I love this tent. I've impressed my camp mates with how fast it set up. Was sipping a cold beer while they still struggled. When the sun rose the tent didn't heat up like an oven (as most tents do). I recommend practicing folding it up at home. It was windy on my first overnight and it definitely made it harder to fold up when there was 20mph gusts. It can fit 2 people with not much stuff or one queen size mattress. My only complaint is the window screens are inside of the solid fabric, but it's not enough of a problem to detract a whole star. This tent is seriously great!
customer_reviews.author: Violet Ray

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Whenever we go to the beach with our friends, they’re usually lugging a whole trolley full of umbrellas, tents, chairs, etc, and we didn’t want to have to end up doing that so I went looking for an easier solution and this is it! Lightweight, pops right open, lots of space, great shelter from the sun, and I could fold it back easily all by myself! No trolley needed!
customer_reviews.author: Liz H

customer_reviews.title: BIG
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and some said that the tent was smaller than they thought it would be. What size pop up tent do you think it would be for around $60? Anyway, this tent takes up my living room, pretty much. My 9 yr old daughter loves it and I figure another three girls could fit in there comfortably with sleeping bags, pillows and stuffed animals. Or her and our three 60lb plus dogs with room to spare. In other words this is a really large sized tent. I would definitely recommend this tent and when or if I need to purchase another, this will be the one.
customer_reviews.author: kleforge

customer_reviews.title: Tent broke after 5 or 6 uses. Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This tent was absolutely amazing when it wasn’t broken. I have no idea how it happened, but the 5th or 6th time I went to use it on the beach for the day, I opened it up and one of the pieces inside the tent that is supposed to hold it up had snapped. There’s no way that I could see to fix it. Such a bummer to have to throw this thing in the dumpster - I only had it just over a month. I didn’t treat it roughly at all- normal use and normal storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey and Lailani

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous to put a child in when placed in the sun!
customer_reviews.text: The tent itself is great, easy to put up and fold back up. But I am so glad we tested it at home before going to the beach! We bought it as a shade tent to keep our 6 month old cool. Well, this is not it! In the sun this get terribly hot within minutes and a baby would not do well at all!! It works if its placed in a shaded area but never put a child in this in the full sun!
customer_reviews.author: Darkcola

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tent for Kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a backyard tent for my grandkids. They love it! But it's served as a playhouse in our home as well as a beach cabana. I love all the windows and best of all, we love the way you just fling it open. As a former backpacker, I can see this being a great tent for summer outings. Two would fit nicely, three a bit cramp. I'd say it's not possible for four adults to sleep in this tent but for little kids, four could have a great sleepover. I definitely recommend this for backyard, car camping and beach shading. My only negative is that it's not that intuitive to break down and fold it back up.
customer_reviews.author: EmeryJoe

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this ZOMAKE Pop Up Tent ! Mom too!
customer_reviews.text: I do not have to help my kids fold or unfold this ZOMAKE Pop Up Tent!! They use it and put it away themselves! Which gets a 5 stars from Mom!! They use it to sleep out on our trampoline! It has been used so much the last couple months and is in great shape. Well made. It was a plus to add to our summer "Stay at home" collection!
customer_reviews.author: Ree S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tent!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the easy set up. Like two seconds bammm. The folding back up takes a little practice. Read the direction and do it a couple times to get the feel of it. I camped on top of Desoto mtn and it was full on wind each night shaking the heck out of the tent and had no tears. Only recommendation would be set up a rain tarp or a custom rain fly. The one that sets up with it I don't think it will work well. I really like all the screens to create or restrict air flow. This is perfect size for all my gear , me and my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Ravoner

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I read the reviews before purchasing this tent
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I read the reviews before purchasing this tent. This tent fits 2 average height adult women perfectly. You can probably squeeze a child in there too, but it'll be a bit cramped. I took this tent on my road trip where I camped along way, and it was great for set up. It only takes a few seconds! The footprint took longer to unfold and set up.. I also like all the ventilation this tent has.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. Corner cutting.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cool tent except I can’t use one of the doors since the tent is sewed across the zipper. I contacted the manufacturer and the asked me to cut it the threads going through the zipper and see if that helped lol. The pouch it comes in is already coming apart and I bought received 4/3/20. Looks like I’ve had a year of constant use already. Spend your money on a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: ZOMAKE Pop Up Tent 3 4 Person
customer_reviews.text: Love how light weight and easy to set up. Had to watch a video a few times on how to fold it back up but once you learn that its easy. good size for a couple of grown adults to nap at the beach or keep sun off. It is a large ,maybe 4 ft circle when folded and inside its bag. Great for beach.
customer_reviews.author: vmax63

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend. It's well made and easy to use. Spacious too! 3 kids and 1 adult fit in it.
customer_reviews.author: Renelle Brassfield

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected, built well and handled some wind at the beach without fail. Would like to see the sandbag feature added as it offers additional anchoring of the tent.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: I knew this wasnt a 3 season tent and didnt ...
customer_reviews.text: I knew this wasnt a 3 season tent and didnt expect that performance out of it But its so fall surpassed my expectations with the ease of opening and closing, maintaining structure in wind, and being able to fit me and my gear and pup. It is not a 4 person tent. Its a 2 person tent.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Knows

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality tent
customer_reviews.text: Nice green color. Looks well-built. I bought it as an indoor play tent for my 6-year old child. She loves it, pretending to camp in her bedroom. Make note that it's much, much smaller than what it appears in picture. If you use it as outdoor tent, only fits 2 small to medium sized adults. So forget about using this tent at beach with your entire big family. 2 adults and 1 toddler ok. Otherwise you need more tents.
customer_reviews.author: CMD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach or camping
customer_reviews.text: Once you learn how to fold it back into the bag after it pops up, it’s a breeze! Very portable, waterproof, lightweight, and surprisingly spacious (comfortably sits 4 people).
customer_reviews.author: Karen V Abgarian

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. We have several tents but when we are running late for a camping trip we take this. We get in late no problem. Just pop it up quick and easy. Easy to break down. Follow directions. Very roomy we put queen size mattress and have extra room. For the money it's great. Use for the beach and hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Greatest purchase of my summer! I used this at the beach and it was way worth it. We have a little baby so it was great for her to nap in and protect her from the sun. It is about the size of a Full Sized Bed maybe Queen Size. Super easy to open! A little tricky to close up, but only at fist. Fairly simple after you've done it a few times. I suggest you practice closing it at home, because at the beach with the wind, it will make it harder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tent - HARD TO FOLD AND PUT AWAY!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this tent! Easy to clean from the sand at the beach, great color, kids loved it! HATED trying to fold it and put it away. The video makes it look easy....its NOT! LOL! If you have patience to try 15 times, then great! But....I really cant say anything bad about this tent other than trying to fold it in 90* weather stinks! I do recommend this tent though!! SO EASY to just open and pop into place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was wanting. Had booked a weekend camping trip with some friends - didn’t have a tent but didn’t want to spend a lot of money. This tent worked perfectly. Amazingly fast to set up and take down. Can’t speak to how it holds up in weather as we had perfect weather for our trip. Only negative is that I would definitely say it would not fit 4 people! My boyfriend (who is 6’1”) and I fit cozy - I would say a good fit for 2 people, or maybe 2 adults and a child.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great tent... But the instructions inside on how to close is, aren't helpful. Thankfully a stranger saw us struggling (who had the same tent) and put it back up for us. But it also took her several tries to get it down to the size for the big. We were scared to use it again. Maybe a youtube video is needed on how to close it back up. Otherwise is was wonderful. I literally unzipped the bag and it popped open! Would highly recommend to those who are great at the twisty fold up things!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten M

customer_reviews.title: Great popup tent.
customer_reviews.text: The tent is so easy to setup. It takes only a minute or two to put up. 2-3 minute to fold it up and place it the bag. Folding can be tricky at first but practice makes it much easier and faster. This is not a heavy duty tent, we used it frequently for just a quick pit stop at camping ground along the way during our recent road trip vacation to California from Minnesota. Hotels are just too expensive. would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Alakdan1964

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I am really amazed at how nice this tent is for the price! The build quality is surprisingly good, zippers all seem sturdy, lots of doors and screens to open, very spacious, etc. Not sure how this will hold up in real camping situations but I just wanted something that my son can play with in and behind the house that could fold up and fold down easily. It easily exceeds my expectations and my son absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: thrawnis

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this tent as do my doggies
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tent as do my doggies. It builds itself in a few seconds, and it is also easy to put back together once u watch a YouTube video as I couldn't figure it out based on the instructions. Once u open all the windows this tent is very airy, which u appreciate when u camp with ur doggies & can leave them in there having air flow & views of all angles.
customer_reviews.author: Puntik

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's a good deal. Only fits two people or a full size inflatable.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this barely barely fit a queen inflatable. The corners of the bed were pushing into the sides of the tent. At best I would say no more than two people sleeping together on a full size bed or two sleeping bags. Easy to pop it up and fold it down once you get the technique. Good airflow. Zippers seem sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: ConstantSquirrel

customer_reviews.title: It takes some practice to fold
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect tent for kids to play at home. It's very easy to set up. The first time I had to fold it I had to watch the instructional video many times and it took two persons to fold it. According to the video, one person could fold it. After folding and unfolding a couple of times, I am able to fold it by myself without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for backyard, summer weather for 2!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent! I'm 5'9 and had plenty of room as 1 person camping in friend's back yard in this tent. I could have had my husband in there too and possibly a smaller child. Definitely not 3 adults. Love the moon/sunroof option and large side windows, next time I'm going to sleep on air mattress, yoga mat didn't cut it haha!!! Definitely watch videos many times before trying to collapse and pack it up. That was the hardest and needed my friend's help, but not too bad! Worth the $
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent
customer_reviews.text: I returned this tent because it was just too big for my needs BUT I Loved it! Easy to fold - suggest you watch the YouTube video, and so easy to set up. Windows, ventilation, seemed to be made really well. BUT again, I only need a 1– 2 person tent so I returned it for a smaller, lighter tent.
customer_reviews.author: LizStacie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use once u figure out how to fold it. Can't wait to use it next camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Serrato

customer_reviews.title: Watch a video for takedown.....
customer_reviews.text: Love the "lightening speed" set up. Watched a video on take down. Got it on the second try. It's nice and roomy. There was a small separation on a seam but easily repairable. The top cover that can be reversed to silver to reflect the sun is a nice feature. Love the green. Glad I finally ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great small tent.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not good for 4 people unless they are all children. Two adults could use comfortably for sleeping . Just barely enough room for a queen mattress but worked perfectly for what I needed. It would be great for the beach or quick serious camping. I look forward to using it more in the future. Definitely practice collapsing the tent once you the the hang of that, you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: this tent is too cheap for the quality and usage it brings
customer_reviews.text: was expecting tent like this to be in 200s. This is an instant home ! You could set it up in the beach for 2-3 seconds. Honestly whoever made this, is a genius. My wife can pack/unpack it without effort.
customer_reviews.author: cpatr922

customer_reviews.title: Little big for the beach
customer_reviews.text: There is a lip on the edge so you are either laying all the way in the tent or all the way out. You can try to negate that with blankets, but its still there. The sun top is awesome. The pop up and out feature is great and you can put it away in seconds. (watched a dude do it on youtube twice and had no issues)
customer_reviews.author: Godzilla's-Lawyer

customer_reviews.title: Practice makes perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am going to say that I really did like this pop up tent. The only thing I bad I would say is the fold up part. It was very hard to fold but once I got it I got it. I would suggest practicing folding it before you use it or watch a you tube video. I over all like the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Blanson

customer_reviews.title: BAD ASS. This is so bad ass
customer_reviews.text: BAD ASS. This is so bad ass. Way superseded my expectations! I bought it originally as a beach shelter for my toddler twin because- ya, I wanna waste my time setting up tent stakes while my kids are running away from me. But it has actually been a lifesaver in general. Great for trips; When the boys get fussy it becomes a pop up fort in the living room or a great yard star gazer. It’s an amazing tool in my mom arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy D.

customer_reviews.title: A learning curve to fold it...
customer_reviews.text: It took a few youtube videos and some practice for us to figure out how to fold the tent up, but it's a great tent! It sets up in basically 1 second, which is incredible. Our family of 4 (2 adults, 2 small children) can fit in this tent just fine. It's cozy, but worth the fast set up if we're only camping for 1 night. We took this camping on the California coast once, and it was insanely windy. The tent held up just fine, and everyone else in our group was listening to the wind flap against their tent the whole night. It's a great tent!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: 100% not water proof or resistant
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would be a great 3 day camping tent . it is not do not get me wrong it is comfortable but if you are expecting any type of water not even going to say rain just water to hit the tent buy something else . it sprinkled for 10 mins and the tent was leaking everywhere . every morning I woke up I was wet from condensation . so I bought a tarp to put over it to last my last 2 days and then found out the bottom leaks as well . take it to the beach for a hour or 2 it would be fine but camping with it not a good idea
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Sammons

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a play tent. It’s huge and our son loves it. Can’t speak on whether it works outside, we only use it in doors but I have seen some openings by the stitching so I’m assuming it’s not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Itzaelena Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Pop Up Medium-Large Tent for day camping.
customer_reviews.text: Simple, Big!, great design and air flow with 100% privacy when you close it off. Plus, they also have addition mesh screens everywhere to keeps bugs out. A surpringly perfect Medium-Large pop up tent for day camping, beach napping, play tent for kids and family, probably also great tent for camping at a dry, warmer night location. Really surprising great Tent. The pop up feature is really fun. Instantly sets up. Instantly. My other friends have to struggle with their tests to set them up. I just “popped” mine up, they my bags in it. Walked away . . . It’s actually easy to close. Just practice a few times and it just folds down really quick.
customer_reviews.author: Rob McCabe

customer_reviews.title: Durable and big
customer_reviews.text: We needed a tent for my 3 yr old to play in. This was our third tent and 3 months later it is doing great for us. It is sturdy even when my 2 teenagers jump in and lay around in it. Easy to fold up and put away or move from room to room. Only thing I did not realize is how big it is. It was bigger than expected. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: The Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy to bought this tent! It is so easy to open, great for 3 adults or 6 kids. Perfect for beach. Not heavy at all. Makes in Small bag. Fast delivery. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: Inna Pylypenko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 8)
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool tent! I looked ridiculous hiking with it carabiner clipped to my backpack, but it was so worth it when I tossed the thing in the air at the top of the mountain and it instantly became a tent. It's a little hard to get it back in the bag, but not too bad. I couldn't get it looking flat like it originally was, but that's alright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now if I could only figure out how to fold it..
customer_reviews.text: The tent itself is awesome! Great size, pops up instantly.. Love it. BUT I am apparently one of the few people who just cannot figure out how to fold it up and put it back in the carry case. I've watched the YouTube video and have no idea exactly how he's folding it without breaking the poles. That's the only reason I couldn't give it 5 stars. Needs better folding instructions!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for quick vacations!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister and she loves it! It is big enough for someone that is at least 6 ft. About 3 average people comfortably. Has 2 doors and screen mesh on the two side walls. It comes with a nice zip up bag with strap. The only thing is figuring out how to collapse it back ti fit the bag. The video posted on the item helps a LOT! I recommend watching it and rewatching it to get it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bowing

customer_reviews.title: so we don't feel like we're suffocating inside
customer_reviews.text: We have used this tent in extreme cold temperatures (-8°F) and fairly high winds (25mph) and found it to perform well. Importantly, it breaths well, so we don't feel like we're suffocating inside. Neither are the inner walls as damp with moisture in the morning, like some other tents can be. It fits to people comfortably, but that is a snug fit. Certainly no room for a third.
customer_reviews.author: Kenninghouse

customer_reviews.title: Folding is not easy for the first time
customer_reviews.text: It was not easy to fold it because i was scary i might break the structure. I watched youtube how to fold and tried 4-5times to get it. Once you get it, it’s very nice. Roomy and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy , light and airy
customer_reviews.text: We used it on the beach to give my two year old grandsons relief from the sun. They were able to take naps in it; the many screened areas (all four sides and top!) provided a breeze and kept it nice and cool. It IS light and needed to be weighted down but we just threw our beach bags in it and that sufficed. It has metal spikes to hold it down which would work anywhere but not in the sand. Nice tent!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Great 4 sided beach tent
customer_reviews.text: Great beach tent- It is great that it can be fully enclosed compared to other 3 sided beach tents. We used it on a trip with our toddler and 1 month old and it was great for privacy and beach naps. Nice to be able to open on one side and then change to the other side if the wind/sun changes direction. Feels very spacious inside- more like a camping tent than a sun/ beach tent (in a good way). Somewhat tricky to fold but able to do it once we learned how to fold it like a taco then twist (and watched a few YouTube’s).
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: As I took the tent out of the box, then out of the bag i noticed it was a little flimsy. When i threw it up in the air to pop it open it went lopsided and I noticed it looked bent. I tried using it yesterday for the first time. Mind you i bought it about a month ago but with this whole pandemic shut down i wasn't able to use it sooner thus is when i noticed it said the return option had expired. What do i do with this defective product?
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This tent is actually made really well and is great quality. It’s easy to fold once you’ve did it a couple times. Super easy setup, literally just pops up.
customer_reviews.author: Annikan

customer_reviews.title: Next to impossible to fold back up
customer_reviews.text: This was very difficult to collapse. Watched how to videos and multiple people couldn’t get it done. Would not buy this again. Opens up quickly but the hassle of collapsing it is not worth it. Bought it as a beach tent to keep our little one contained but ended up using it only once during our weeklong trip. It does have nice ventilation and the size was just comfortable enough for two adults to lay down in.
customer_reviews.author: leigh

customer_reviews.title: I sleep in a tent every night.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to buy a tent like a photo, but it's hard to find and expensive. Instead, I buy and use ZOMAKE POP UP TENT, It takes one minute to fold and unfold. The quality is good and the price is satisfactory. If the price goes down a bit, I want to buy one more and use it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to use with her friends who like to camp out in the yard when having sleepovers. It works great, quick easy set up. Once you fold it up once it is super easy. Perfect for its purpose!
customer_reviews.author: S. Schnake

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for 6 ft hub and 2 kids
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we wanted. Big enough for the hub to camp in the backyard with the kids. He’ll need to sleep in the middle and then on either side. Takes two secs to set up and after u watch a video on how to fold it down- it takes 30 secs to put away. Perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: momma jess

customer_reviews.title: easiest set up ever
customer_reviews.text: I used this tent when I went camping last weekend. Worked great! Even with a little rain, it stayed dry inside. And so easy to set up and take down. For fair weather camping, one or two people, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Tunester

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my best Amazon purchase. This was perfect for the beach. My boyfriend is 6 feet tall and could stretch out and still have more than enough space. To open the tent, you just take it out of the case (for lack of a better word) that it comes in and it literally pops right open. Closing it took a little more time. I would advise you practice at home, but after the first couple tries, we got it closed with no issues. If you are looking for a durable, spacious tent, this one is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great shade and easy to transport!
customer_reviews.text: This summer my oldest son is playing baseball. There is rarely any shade available and since I have two younger children shade and a confinement area is a must (otherwise I don’t get to see the game.) this tent took 2 times for me to figure out how to get it folded but other then that it works perfectly for what we use it for!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Schluppenbaum

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!!! I think this is the best purchase Ive made!! It literally takes SECONDS to set up and its so spacious. Yes, it is somehow difficult to put it back in the bag, I was able to fold it real quick, but it didnt fit in the bag so I didnt do it right. There is a video in the reviews, I recommend you watch it before you use it. Other than that, thisnis a great tent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HARD to fold up!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent when it's out, but literally dread putting it back in the bag. Many arguments were started folding this tent back up...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! I love using this at the beach it’s light weight and it saves up time from having to build it or take it apart. Love that it’s also small enough to fit the trunk and I still have plenty of room for the rest of my items
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beach tent
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tent. The fold down size is a bit bigger than I anticipated. I love that all the windows and both doors have the netting. I bought this for use as a beach tent and it's perfect for that. This tent can provide full sun coverage unlike others that leave you exposed as the sun moves throughout the day. I can't wait to use it at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: ap

customer_reviews.title: Wow what a tent!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent beach/picnic tent. Not waterproof for rains but fine for a drizzle. Super easy to unfold..... just toss in the air. Folding is super easy too ..... just you need to know which ends to hold and which direction to bend - ample of videos on YouTube to guide for folding.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul Baasit Hafiz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room it worked great we did have a little trouble folding it up but it’s just hard to understand but once we figured out it was terrific, Make sure and watch the videos on how to fold it up
customer_reviews.author: Angeladduci

customer_reviews.title: It is super easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: A full size blow up mattress fits in here. It is super easy to put up, stake, and take down. The top however is not closed off entirely from the mesh, so if it rained you would have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna lewandowski

customer_reviews.title: Way bigger than what I expected. So difficult to ...
customer_reviews.text: Way bigger than what I expected. So difficult to fold back into its bag!!! It's a headache. I bought it so I can go with my boys to the beach get up n go quickly but this turned out to be a nightmare for me. I wish it had some velcro for the top shade to stay in place because it was flying all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is absolutely perfect for the beach! We needed something that completely closed so I could breastfeed my daughter and this worked great! It is easy to open and close and is super lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: Britney Cosello

customer_reviews.title: It's a perfect tent for a light camping trip
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect tent for a light camping trip! I love it! Easy to set it up as well as to fold it back. " sheepdog " 's video demonstration gave a tremendous help though, thanks very much! A great product!
customer_reviews.author: S. Stone

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I wish they would change...
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent! The only thing I wish they would change is the of fabric that is covering the the bottom tent pools. I personally think it is to thin and is already getting scratched up more than I would like. But would still buy this product again in the future. Just hope they start making that part more durable with thicker fabric!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and so functional
customer_reviews.text: Love the rectangle shape and all of the window and door options. Much better layout than my last triangle shaped cabana. Only wish it had exterior pockets at the outer side bases to fill with sand to keep it weighted down like my old one did. (All the sand easily dumped out when folding up)
customer_reviews.author: L M

customer_reviews.title: this tent is fantastic as an easy
customer_reviews.text: Once you sort out how to fold it back up, this tent is fantastic as an easy, compact, quick tent. We sue it for camping, and to take to our soccer games for our daughter to hang out in. It's held up well, and again, sooooo easy to set up and put away! Definitely not for 4 people though. 2 max.
customer_reviews.author: ♪☺♫

customer_reviews.title: Nice beach tent
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. To fold, it’s not so easy but it’s okay. We had to practice at home before we brought this to the beach. It’s lightweight, and fits 3-4 people. I like how it has 2 doors/entry way and you can just open it up and there’s a mesh lining for ventilation for both sides.
customer_reviews.author: TLCalinao

customer_reviews.title: Mild weather tent only
customer_reviews.text: If you are camping somewhere with rain or where you'll get lots of condensation, this isn't the best choice. But if you need a super easy and quick pop up tent, this thing is great.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky to fold back up - has lasted 2 years - like any tent depends how well you take care of it. Grandson uses outside in back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ZOMAKE Pop Up Tent 3 4 Person, Beach Tent Sun Shelter for Baby with UV Protection - Automatic and Instant Setup Tent for Family
feature_bullets: It could be used for general camping in clear weather. It is also a great gift for kids as play house and sun shelter
Seconds Pop Up - Open the package, unstrap the tent, throw it in the air, watch it open itself in seconds. No need to fumble with poles or complicated instructions
Ventilation& Blocking Mosquitoes - 2 mesh doors, 2 mesh windows and an extra big mesh roof sky window. With high density mesh net, being air fresh while keeping insects out
Tent Size - Open size : Very roomy for 3 adults, could easily fit 4 if needed. Ideal for a family rest. Folding Size: 80 cm in diameter as a disc（With installation instructions）
Material - Durable sturdy 190T PU-coated silver ANTI-UV polyester fabric, provide UPF 50+ Sun Protection and no odd smell inside the tent

NO RISK BUYING - Carrying bag With the installation instructions, or you can search “ZOMAKE tent” on the ""Youtube"" for the folding video. If anything at all goes wrong with your tent, you have 90 days to request a replacement, completely for free! This is our crazy promise. We don't lie.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
